hero.title: Civil Engineer, QA/QC Manager, Consultant & Construction Expert.
hero.description: I'm Taha Fawzi, a Civil Engineer with 12+ years of experience in quality management, supervision, and construction execution across major projects in Egypt and Saudi Arabia. Skilled in leading QA/QC systems, structural inspections, and delivering high-quality residential, commercial, and infrastructure developments

head.title: Civil Engineering Journey
head.description: With 12+ years of experience in Egypt and Saudi Arabia, I’ve worked on residential, commercial, and infrastructure projects, ensuring quality and impact from planning to completion.

card1.title: QA/QC Management
card1.description: Ensuring top construction quality through inspections, audits, and compliance with international standards.

card2.title: Construction & Project Management
card2.description: Managing projects from planning to handover, controlling time, cost, and stakeholder coordination.

card3.title: Consultancy & Supervision
card3.description: Supervising site execution to ensure compliance with designs, safety, and client requirements.

head.title: My Projects

project1.title: Al-Jabr Wedding Hall
project1.description: Al-Jabr Wedding Hall is a modern venue designed and built to host elegant weddings and large gatherings. The project focused on high-quality finishing, efficient space planning, and durable structures, creating a luxurious and welcoming atmosphere for guests.
